snippet: Developers have been encouraged by reports of job creation and companies planning to move back to the city’s downtown.
abstract: Companies in Chicago are encouraged by reports of job creation, prompting plans to move back to the downtown area; developers have introduced plans for half a dozen new office towers in the Loop central business district to fulfill the demand.
lead_paragraph: Developers have been encouraged by reports of job creation and companies planning to move back to the city’s downtown.

headline.seo: Chicago Loop Attracts Development of New Office Space
headline.main: Chicago Attracts New Towers With River Views
headline.print_headline: Chicago Attracts New Towers With River Views
